query: SELECT bt.id, bt.customerId, bt.amount, bt.type, bt.origin, bt.description, bt.metadata, bt.createdAt, c.name as customerName FROM balance_transactions bt LEFT JOIN customers c ON bt.customerId = c.id WHERE bt.type = 'credit' AND bt.origin = 'system' AND bt.metadata LIKE '%referralId%' ORDER BY bt.createdAt DESC LIMIT 5;
